title: The inner hypnotic power / Dr Paret
description:
Non-verbal techniques unlock our inner power. Dr Paret will sow you an important inner key. The non-verbal elements are fundamental for successful hypnosis. Non-verbal hypnosis is the basis for stronger and more effective hypnosis. In our school we develop unique non-verbal techniques that permit to reach the deepest self.

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
